ext_weather.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Rain Showers
ext_weather.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers after 5am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 43. Northwest wind 0 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.
